

[[edraw:]]


The basic idea is that blerps can randomly hit on a connectivity (recruit the right neurons) to say
"look at me" at the motoric areas and "think me" to the concept areas.



concept + motor data in turn creates expectation states at the blerp layer.






* Blerps

- The initial idea is to make something like Vehicle 1, but this time have top-down constraints
  (system variables) that take over the sensor so to say



** Composite Blerp

-


* Program synthesis

* Thought pump

* Coarse Graining
